'''Lightning-Riding Adventurer (II)''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Inazuma: The Islands of Thunder and Eternity - Series II]]''. The achievements are earned by completing Open World mechanism-activated [[Time Trial Challenge]]s on Watatsumi Island and Seirai Island in [[Inazuma]].
